entry.title: Scaling Factors for Hidden Markov Models

link.title: Scaling Factors for Hidden Markov Models

entry.content:
Heading for checking font size h2

Here are some words. And this is some math:

This works exactly the same as obsidian $x$ and $y$ $e = mc^2.$

$e = mc^2. \tag{1}$

tag를 붙이면 위처럼 display 모드가 자동으로 됨.

오 그대가 내게로 오기

Cool!
